Requirement_Description: System shall allow users to login using email and password
System shall provide password reset functionality for users who forgot their password
System shall allow users to login using Facebook account
System shall allow users to login using Google account
System shall provide user registration functionality with fields for first name, last name, email, contact number, password, and confirm password
System shall require users to accept terms and conditions during registration
System shall require email verification before users can login
System shall send email verification link to registered email address
System shall allow users to login only after email verification is completed
System shall allow users to search products by keyword
System shall allow users to browse products by category and sub-category
System shall provide filtering options for product search
System shall provide sorting options for product search
System shall allow product search without requiring user login
System shall display product listing with product title, thumbnail image, price, and ratings
System shall allow users to navigate to product detail page by clicking product title or image
System shall allow users to view product listings without login
System shall display comprehensive product details including title, images, description, price, size variations, color variations, and ratings & reviews
System shall allow users to check shipping availability by entering PIN code on product detail page
System shall display product thumbnail and multiple product images
System shall allow users to view product details without login
System shall provide functionality to add product to shopping cart from product detail page
System shall provide functionality to add product to wishlist from product detail page
System shall allow users to share products on social media
System shall prevent adding products to wishlist without user login
System shall require user registration and login to maintain wishlist
System shall allow buyers to view wishlist items
System shall allow buyers to add products to wishlist
System shall allow buyers to delete products from wishlist
System shall allow buyers to proceed to checkout with wishlist items
System shall allow adding products to shopping cart from product detail page
System shall require user registration and login to manage shopping cart
System shall allow users to add items to shopping cart
System shall allow users to remove items from shopping cart
System shall allow users to update quantity of items in shopping cart
System shall allow users to proceed to checkout with cart items
System shall display item price, sub-total, and total price in shopping cart
System shall process checkout for items selected from shopping cart
System shall require user login for checkout and payment
System shall require users to enter billing address before checkout
System shall require users to enter shipping address before checkout
System shall provide credit card payment option
System shall provide debit card payment option
System shall provide net banking payment option
System shall display order summary showing item total, sub-total, shipping cost, tax, and order total
System shall send email notifications to buyers for order status updates
System shall process online payment in advance before order placement
System shall allow users to share products on social media
System shall not require login for sharing products on social media
System shall allow buyers to manage profile details including email and phone number
System shall allow buyers to change password from account section
System shall allow buyers to manage multiple addresses from account section
System shall provide access to My Orders section from My Account
System shall provide access to Wishlist section from My Account
System shall provide access to Shopping Cart section from My Account
System shall provide access to Ratings and Reviews section from My Account
System shall provide logout functionality from My Account
System shall allow users to give ratings and reviews for ordered products
System shall allow users to post ratings and reviews only for products they have ordered
System shall require login and registration to post ratings and reviews
System shall display product ratings and reviews to all users
System shall allow buyers to view list of past orders
System shall display order details including total amount paid, shipping address, item quantity, and price per unit
System shall allow buyers to reorder items from order history
System shall allow buyers to track current orders from My Orders section
System shall provide order shipment tracking functionality
System shall allow buyers to contact support team via email
System shall provide contact form with fields for name, email, contact number, and message
System shall send email to admin when buyer submits support request
System shall provide contact support functionality for buyers
System shall allow admin to login to admin panel using username and password
System shall provide password reset functionality for admin users
System shall display total number of active registered buyers on admin dashboard
System shall display total number of inactive registered buyers on admin dashboard
System shall display total number of products uploaded on admin dashboard
System shall display total revenue for today on admin dashboard
System shall display total revenue for current month on admin dashboard
System shall allow admin to view buyer account information
System shall allow admin to edit buyer account information
System shall allow admin to activate buyer accounts
System shall allow admin to deactivate buyer accounts
System shall allow admin to view buyer profile details, addresses, orders, wishlist, and cart items
System shall allow admin to view list of all orders with current status
System shall allow admin to view order details
System shall allow admin to edit order details
System shall allow admin to update order status
System shall support order statuses: Open, Confirmed, In Process, Shipped, and Delivered
System shall allow admin to manage order shipments
System shall allow admin to maintain shipment details including carrier, tracking ID, status, delivery address, and shipping cost
System shall allow admin to add product categories
System shall allow admin to edit product categories
System shall allow admin to activate/deactivate product categories
System shall allow admin to add product sub-categories
System shall allow admin to edit product sub-categories
System shall allow admin to activate/deactivate product sub-categories
System shall allow admin to add products to catalog
System shall allow admin to edit products in catalog
System shall allow admin to activate/deactivate products in catalog
System shall allow admin to manage product name, images, description, keywords, and variations (color, size)
System shall allow admin to view payment information including bank account details
System shall allow admin to edit payment information
System shall allow admin to view payment status of each order
System shall integrate with Stripe payment gateway
System shall allow admin to approve ratings and reviews posted by buyers
System shall allow admin to reject ratings and reviews posted by buyers
System shall provide report of products uploaded by date range
System shall provide report of products uploaded by month
System shall provide report of products uploaded by year
System shall provide revenue report for today
System shall provide revenue report for current week
System shall provide revenue report by date range
System shall provide revenue report by month
System shall provide revenue report by year
System shall allow admin to export reports in PDF format
System shall allow admin to export reports in Excel format
System shall allow admin to create sub-admin users
System shall allow admin to edit sub-admin users
System shall allow admin to delete sub-admin users
System shall allow admin to activate/deactivate sub-admin users
System shall provide role-based access control for sub-admin users
System shall allow admin to add roles with specific permissions
System shall allow admin to edit roles
System shall allow admin to delete roles
System shall allow admin to activate/deactivate roles
System shall allow admin to edit About Us page content
System shall allow admin to edit Contact Us page content
System shall allow admin to edit Privacy Policy page content
System shall allow admin to edit Terms and Conditions page content
System shall allow admin to add email content for new product launches
System shall allow admin to edit email content for promotional campaigns
System shall allow admin to delete email templates
System shall allow admin to send promotional emails to buyers
System shall allow admin to view queries and complaints from buyers
System shall allow admin to view feedback from buyers
System shall send email to admin when buyer submits complaint or feedback
System shall support up to 100 concurrent users
System web pages shall load within 30 seconds with good internet speed
System shall display appropriate error messages instead of broken pages when content is not available
System shall not display "page not found" errors for unavailable pages
System shall implement SSL security for all communications
System shall implement encryption for online payment processing
System shall protect payment card data during transmission
System shall accept orders only from United States
System shall display all prices in USD currency
System shall not support ordering of custom-sized products
